mapper.select: SELECT acq_gender, acq_interest, acq_dt FROM tb_acquisition WHERE sbs_seq = #{sbs_seq} AND acq_dt = current_date
mapper.insert: insert into tb_acquisition (acq_gender, acq_interest, acq_start_dt, acq_end_dt, acq_tid, sbs_seq) values(#{acq_gender}, #{acq_interest}, #{acq_start_dt}, #{acq_end_dt}, #{acq_tid}, #{sbs_seq})
mapper.update: update tb_acquisition set acq_gender = #{acq_gender}, acq_interest = #{acq_interest}, acq_start_dt = #{acq_start_dt}, acq_end_dt = #{acq_end_dt} where acq_tid = #{acq_tid} and device_uid = #{device_uid}
